title: List of all Android navigation  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android navigation  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: NavigationTabBar
repoList.description: Navigation tab bar with colorful interactions.

repoList.name: navigation-toolbar-android
repoList.description: :octocat: Navigation toolbar is a slide-modeled UI navigation controller made by @Ramotion

repoList.name: BottomBar
repoList.description: (Deprecated) A custom view component that mimics the new Material Design Bottom Navigation pattern.

repoList.name: NavigationTabStrip
repoList.description: Navigation tab strip with smooth interaction.

repoList.name: MeowBottomNavigation
repoList.description: Android Meow Bottm Navigation

repoList.name: AndroidNavigation
repoList.description: A library managing navigation, nested Fragment, StatusBar, Toolbar for Android

repoList.name: BottomNavigation
repoList.description: This Library helps users to use Bottom Navigation Bar (A new pattern from google) with ease and allows ton of customizations

repoList.name: bubble-navigation
repoList.description: 🎉 [Android Library] A light-weight library to easily make beautiful Navigation Bar with ton of 🎨 customization option.

repoList.name: Custom-Navigation-Drawer
repoList.description: Custom Navigation Drawer Library for Android

repoList.name: duo-navigation-drawer
repoList.description: A flexible, easy to use, unique drawer library for your Android project.
